org.apache.log4j
Class LogXF

java.lang.Object
  org.apache.log4j.LogXF
Direct Known Subclasses:
LogMF, LogSF
public abstract class LogXF
extends Object

This is a base class for LogMF and LogSF parameterized logging classes.

Since:
1.2.16
See Also:
LogMF, LogSF
